name: IWS
description:
IWS is an award-winning digital agency with more than a decade on the front lines of Internet, print and multimedia marketing and advertising.
IWS stands for Integrated Web Strategy. We and our philosophy is that using interactive and traditional advertising in conjunction is the key to marketing success. Our award-winning campaigns have successful generated leads and sales, promoted brand awareness, won political campaigns, enacted legislation and created stand-out web presences.
